name: Okainos
description:
Okainos is a tactical card game where the goal is to destroy the opponent budget. Here is the booklet of rules :

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1LapBd27HWDqhqhvOzgIisREvylwHhMdZ

THE GAME IS ONLY PLAYABLE ONLINE, AS YOU NEED ANOTHER PLAYER TO PLAY IT WITH YOU.

And here is the link to our discord.

https://discord.gg/kVjJPC8
